content: I'm working on revamping the FHIR space in Confluence to make it easier to navigate. There is a lot of information that was just brought over from the Wiki and may be out of date. Is there anyone (or maybe multiple people - doesn't have to be FMG members) that would be willing to help me in reviewing content as I review and edit?
Ill help out. I am leveraging some of the content in IHE, so that content is important. Also, I might learn something. Information overload is a big problem.
Thanks @John Moehrke Once I have content ready, I'll send it your way!
